network.name: Minuteman Library Network
network.notes: Largest Library of Things program in Massachusetts

libraries.name: Morse Institute Library
libraries.notes: MOST EXTENSIVE tool collection in Massachusetts - 168+ verified items including actual power tools

libraries.name: Robbins Library
libraries.notes: Kitchen, tools, games, crafts, wellness, outdoor, music, party supplies

libraries.name: Watertown Free Public Library
libraries.notes: Also operates Hatch Makerspace with additional equipment. Kim Hewitt previously ran Needham program and is frequently quoted about Library of Things.

libraries.name: Needham Free Public Library
libraries.notes: Outdoor gear, camping equipment, ukuleles, tools. Featured in NBC Boston story.

libraries.name: Brookline Public Library
libraries.notes: WiFi hotspots (most popular), high-end telescope (high demand), camping gear

libraries.name: Cary Memorial Library
libraries.notes: Items available to all MLN patrons, must pickup/return in Lexington

libraries.name: Woburn Public Library
libraries.notes: Mobile hotspots for Woburn residents only

libraries.name: Newton Free Library
libraries.notes: Large library system with multiple branches
